title: The Prime Minister's Executive Ass
description: Flint Ramrod finally breaks into the sexy, exciting world of Canadian politics!There's a newly elected Prime Minister in town, and one of his first orders of business is to meet his new executive assistant, Steven. With a healthy dose of Canadian humour, they'll navigate some of the sexiest issues the highest office in the land can provide!This 3750 word short story contains two Canadian men having one sexy time, including anal, blow jobs, and Bill C-51.
author: Flint Ramrod
